Crave Digital is a comprehensive self-publishing tool that enables independent creators to produce, distribute, promote, and monetize their musical and audiovisual works. Our platform provides direct access to global streaming services and utilizes AI tools to create animations, music videos, and effective promotional materials that increase creators' online visibility. Additionally, one of the most innovative aspects of our service is the integration of the NFT (Non-Fungible Tokens) market, which opens up new revenue streams for artists by enabling the sale of digital rights to their works. Crave Digital not only simplifies creative and distribution processes but also transforms the way content is promoted. Thanks to automated advertising campaigns supported by an advanced recommendation engine, creators can more effectively reach their audience, maximizing their work's potential reach and impact.
We aim to create an environment where every artist, regardless of experience level or financial resources, has an equal chance of success. Crave Digital is more than just a platform - it is a movement towards openness and equality in art. We invite all creators to join our community and shape the future of music and media together.

fields.Business Description:
Residential solar is all the rage. It delivers the cheapest energy to households and avoids using grid energy that is not renewable and very expensive. But can all households take advantage of the benefits of solar power?

Just 50% of Europeans live in a house with a roof on which they can install solar panels. Everybody else lives in apartments that have no roof for a solar installation. In Southern Europe, where solar energy works best, 60-65% of households live in apartments. Robinsun brings the advantages of cheap solar energy to this unserved majority.

Installing solar panels on your balcony or pergola is easier and cheaper than you think. A 21st century Robin Hood would definitely fit his balcony with a Plug & Play Solar Kit, would stop paying huge power bills and would go get a subsidy from the sheriff.

Likewise, todays Robinson Crusoe would have generated solar energy on his balcony a long time ago, heading over to the nearest DIY store to get components and build himself a Plug & Play Solar Kit. And he would not be asking for permits.

Robinsun is a European tech company based in Madrid. We develop innovative renewable energy products that combine proven technologies with mass market applications.

Robinsun was founded by Boris Hageney, a veteran entrepreneur in eCommerce in Europe and the US. Boris' main motivation to found Robinsun was the desire to build a scalable consumer tech company that participates in the fight against climate change. Every Plug & Play Solar Kit we sell is a small step in our common goal: to decarbonize the energy we use, and save our planet.

A company is only as good as its people. In our HQ an international and purpose-driven team is working hard to grow Robinsun, improve the products and services we deliver to our customers, and get customers on board with our mission. If you like what we do, you might want to join us.

Robinsun was born to contribute to the fight against climate change. We help households decarbonize the energy they consume. Also as a company, Robinsun commits to a net zero footprint.

From the energy we consume, to our company policies on travel and office space, as well as our packaging and logistics efforts, we measure our footprint and offset the inevitable. We will report on our progress on a regular basis.
fields.Tags: Solar, renewable energy, solar plug & play kits, solar balcony kits

Rhazes AI is a revolutionary clinical decision support and intelligent scribe system offered to doctors to help them with diagnosis, documentation and patient management.
fields.Long Business Description:
1 in 10 people die because of a diagnostic error and your doctor spends  of their time doing paperwork. Medical knowledge doubles every 73 days and doctors have the highest burnout rates ever recorded. To address these problems, we have created an end-to-end AI solution for clinicians that gives them specialist-level help with diagnosis and management, and an intelligent scribe that can handle all their paperwork. We help doctors be more productive by automatically taking care of their paperwork (SOAP notes, outpatient notes, investigation requests, referral letters, discharge summaries, etc) and be more confident by suggesting alternative diagnoses at 99.6% accuracy as well as treatment plans.

fields.Business Description: Eatiful is the simple app that helps people with unwanted weight to improve their health by changing HOW they eat, by leveraging the best of slow & mindful eating. Change how you eat. Not what you eat.
fields.Long Business Description:
Most people who want to lose weight turn to diets. Diets change WHAT people eat. Diets fail because they focus on the WHAT, not the HOW of eating. At Eatiful, we understand how people eat: over two thirds of people with unwanted weight (67%) eat too quickly and 78% overeat at every meal. 
Eatiful is a simple app that changes HOW you eat.  It centres on a new way of eating, not on restricting food. It teaches you to slow your eating, and as a result, enjoy food more and lose weight. The app lets you learn your eating style, learn the Eatiful Method, set weight and life goals and develop your daily practice. People use Eatiful long term for reassurance and support, journalling and self discovery and to track and share goals and achievements.
Eatiful is launching first on iOS, later on Android. Eatiful leverages the best of mobile technology to embed mindful eating into users' lives. It uses notifications to encourage daily check-ins and journalling at the point of eating.  It enables quick meal before and after pictures. It presents users with an engaging audio lesson to embed mindful eating principles each day, plus forthcoming community features including virtual eat-ins.

As a young Germany startup, ChipCart has rapidly become a key player in electronic component sales. We've merged IT innovation with extensive market experience, creating a platform that simplifies procurement by consolidating different supplier sources into one efficient delivery system. 

This approach significantly optimizes time and financial expenses for our clients. Additionally, we offer a unique solution for managing excess inventory, allowing companies to post and sell surplus stock, freeing up resources for further development. 

Operating globally, with a strong European presence and expanding to the US, we provide unmatched access and convenience in the electronic components market. Our commitment to transparency, security, and customer satisfaction sets us apart, making ChipCart an essential partner in the electronics sector.
fields.Long Business Description:
ChipCart is a young startup in the field of electronic component sales, launched in September 2023.
Our startup is the result of a merger between an IT development team and experienced professionals in the electronic components market.
The project was developed by an international team with extensive experience in developing ERP systems for trade and warehouse business. These are high-class professionals with experience in launching E-commerce projects worldwide. Currently, our team includes 35 developers.
The most challenging part of working in the electronic components market is correctly combining modern technologies with the traditions and experience of classic distribution. Only professionals with vast experience in this market can handle such a task. They have become the connecting link that created ChipCart, led by our CEO, who has over 35 years of experience in the electronic components sales industry.
Uniting modern technical solutions with extensive market experience was achieved by professionals experienced in working with electronic components, led by our CEO with over 30 years of experience in the industry.
Advantages of Our Project
Wide Supplier Base
Typically, each manufacturer works with 5-6 component suppliers. This limitation is due to significant time and financial burdens. The more suppliers there are, the more time is needed to obtain data - prices, availability, delivery terms, special conditions, etc.
Our platform consolidates data from more than 250 suppliers, including official distributors, catalogs, and partners, including connected partner warehouses, OEM, and EMS.
We operate transparently and convey the sources of components. Thus, every buyer can visit the original site and ensure that the displayed price of components matches the source's price.
For our clients, this optimizes time and financial expenses on purchases, plus budget savings due to choosing the optimal price.
In layman's terms, we are a platform that in real-time displays offers from the largest marketplaces and online stores, allowing you to choose the best conditions in terms of price and delivery time, and receive all orders in one delivery, instead of 5-10 different deliveries. All this at the same price as if you were buying directly from each separate site.
Convenience
This approach allows all work to be done in one window. Even if you purchase 50 different components from 15 suppliers, you only sign one contract with us and receive everything in one free delivery.
Our platform is absolutely free. We do not set markups or hidden commissions. You can buy from your usual suppliers on the terms you are accustomed to.
Additionally, you receive online analytics of the purchase price from all suppliers, including your "neighbors" who have excess electronic components.
Working with Excess Inventory
One of our key advantages is working with excess inventory. Currently, many companies are concerned about the situation with excess inventory of electronic components in their warehouses. This is frozen money and occupied space.
Our platform works not only with catalogs but also allows any company, after data verification, to post and sell their excess inventory. This enables businesses to free up financial flows and warehouse space and redirect these resources to development.
Our platform provides access to the global market and operates 24/7. Starting work is very simple  just send a list of items and provide data on the originality of components. After agreeing on all details, the goods appear on the platform.
For the convenience and safety of our clients, we thoroughly check the source of components and datacode to ensure the originality of goods. We also have high requirements for updating data through API, giving us an up-to-date picture of component availability in the warehouse.
Confidentiality and security are very important to us. We do not disclose companies that sell their goods through the excess inventory program.
Unlike traditional brokers, we use all the possibilities of modern IT for automation and simplification of processes. The client sees the price and quantity in real-time. There is no need to send a request. Just click the "buy" button, and all components (even from different sources) will arrive in one free delivery.
We believe that our platform will help the market achieve balance and relieve European manufacturers from the burden of excess inventory.
Geography as an Advantage
We are a European company that takes advantage of global work with all markets. Currently, our office is located in Germany. We also have representations in Hong Kong, Singapore, and plan to open an office in the USA mid-year.
At the moment, the European market knows little about Chinese distributors of electronic components. On our platform, you can see warehouses and prices for components on these platforms.
This gives the customer an incredible level of freedom in choosing a source for purchasing electronic components.

fields.Long Business Description:
Introducing Mesh: Revolutionizing Online Shopping for the #SaveNowBuyLater Era
Welcome to the dawn of the #SaveNowBuyLater era, where responsible spending meets effortless discovery. In a world inundated with Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) services pushing consumers towards impulsive purchases, Mesh emerges as a beacon of mindful shopping and financial well-being.
At Mesh (https://www.use-mesh.com/), we're on a mission to redefine the online shopping experience, empowering users to save wisely and discover purposefully across any website or app. Gone are the days of mindless spending and cluttered bookmarks. Here's what sets Mesh apart:
Ad-Free Zone: Say goodbye to intrusive ads and data tracking. Mesh is committed to providing a serene, ad-free environment where your privacy is respected, and your data remains secure.
Effortless Saving: No more scattered screenshots or forgotten bookmarks. With Mesh, saving your favorite items is as simple as sharing a link. Seamlessly organize your finds into personalized lists for easy access and future reference.
Community Collaboration: Engage with friends and fellow shoppers through Mesh's unique voting feature. Make informed decisions together, share shopping discoveries, and explore new products in a collaborative, pressure-free environment.
Control and Convenience: Take back control of your online shopping experience with Mesh. Download our app and discover the joy of shopping that's fun, organized, and devoid of unnecessary pressure.
By prioritizing user empowerment and financial mindfulness, Mesh transforms the way we shop online, fostering a culture of informed consumption and long-term satisfaction. Join us in embracing a more sustainable and fulfilling approach to online shopping.
Experience Mesh today and embark on a journey towards smarter spending and greater fulfillment.

fields.Business Description: AquilaX is an AI-powered Application Security Platform (ASPM) that seamlessly integrates security into the software development lifecycle (SDLC). It leverages machine learning (ML) and AI to automate security scanning, vulnerability triage, and remediation, reducing false positives and developer friction. With multi-scanner coverage (SAST, SCA, DAST, malware, API security) and flexible deployment options (SaaS, private cloud, on-prem), AquilaX enables teams to build secure software efficiently. Trusted globally, it has scanned 10B+ lines of code and identified millions of vulnerabilities, redefining DevSecOps with AI
fields.Long Business Description:
AquilaX: AI-Driven Application Security for Modern Development
AquilaX is a next-generation AI-powered Application Security Platform (ASPM) designed to integrate security seamlessly into the software development lifecycle (SDLC). By leveraging advanced machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), AquilaX automates security code scanning, vulnerability management, and DevSecOps processes, enabling developers to build secure software without disrupting their workflow.
Key Offerings:
		AI-Powered Security Scanning: Runs 8+ parallel security scanners to detect vulnerabilities across source code, dependencies, containers, and infrastructure-as-code (IaC).
		Securitron AI Engine: A proprietary AI model trained on over 300 million open-source projects, capable of automating vulnerability triage, reducing false positives, and providing contextual remediation insights .
		Comprehensive Security Coverage: Supports SAST, SCA, DAST, malware detection, API security, and compliance checks .
		Developer-Friendly Security: Offers IDE integrations, CI/CD automation, and AI-powered chat assistance, enabling a frictionless DevSecOps experience .
		Flexible Deployment Models: Available as a multi-tenant SaaS, isolated single-tenant instance, or private cloud/on-prem deployment .
		Proactive Security Consultation: Provides expert DevSecOps consultation, application security training, and managed security services .
AquilaX is trusted by global enterprises and leading development teams, having scanned over 10 billion lines of code and identified millions of vulnerabilities . With cutting-edge AI automation, AquilaX is redefining application securityeliminating complexity, reducing costs, and delivering zero-noise vulnerability detection .
For more information, visit AquilaX.ai.

Skillscanner AS is a company that offers AI-software for recruitment. Established in 2023 with offices in Oslo, Norway. With a goal of streamlining the recruitment process and making it fairer, the solution enables a deeper understanding of candidates using artificial intelligence. Collaborating with leading companies such as Frend Digital, Finanstalenter, Kindly, Meyer Haugen and others, the company wants to improve selection methods and support a more inclusive world of work.
 
The AI-solution makes it possible for employers and recruiters to get to know large numbers of candidates through voice-based mini-interviews. Kedra Chat seamlessly adds a live chat and AI chatbot widget to your store. Respond to customer inquiries directly within your Shopify admin panel, and customize the widget's appearance to perfectly match your brand. Gain valuable insights through chat analytics, including customer location and device type. The AI bot can recommend products and guide customers through your store, boosting sales and improving customer satisfaction. Kedra Chat empowers you to deliver exceptional customer service.
fields.Long Business Description:
Kedra Chat: Elevate Your Customer Experience with Personalized Live Chat and AI Support
Kedra Chat is a powerful Shopify app designed to revolutionize the way you connect with your customers. It seamlessly integrates with your Shopify admin panel, empowering you to offer exceptional live chat support and leverage the power of AI-powered chatbots  all under your brand identity.
Seamless Integration for Effortless Support:
Effortless Setup: Kedra Chat integrates effortlessly with your existing Shopify admin panel, eliminating the need for complex configurations. You'll be up and running in minutes, ready to connect with your customers.
Centralized Communication Hub: Manage all your customer interactions from a single, convenient location within your Shopify admin. Respond to live chat inquiries and monitor AI chatbot interactions, ensuring a smooth and efficient support experience.
Unparalleled Customization for a Branded Experience:
Match Your Brand Identity: Kedra Chat goes beyond generic chat widgets. Customize the chat window with your brand's fonts, colors, and even add your logo for a seamless brand experience. Your customers will feel like they're interacting directly with your brand, fostering trust and loyalty.
No Kedra Branding, Just Yours: The chat widget is completely free of any Kedra branding, ensuring your customers interact solely with your brand identity. This reinforces brand recognition and strengthens customer relationships.
Actionable Insights for Data-Driven Decisions:
Comprehensive Analytics: Gain valuable insights into your customer interactions through Kedra Chat's built-in analytics dashboard. Track key metrics, analyze chat transcripts, and identify areas for improvement to continuously refine your customer support strategy.
Customer Data at Your Fingertips: Kedra Chat intelligently collects customer data such as country and device type, providing you with valuable demographic information. This allows you to tailor your marketing efforts and product offerings for a more personalized customer experience.
AI-Powered Support for Increased Efficiency:
Automated Product Recommendations: Kedra Chat's AI chatbot can be configured to recommend products based on customer browsing behavior and purchase history. This personalized approach streamlines the buying process and increases customer satisfaction.
Intelligent Guidance & Support: The AI chatbot can be programmed to answer frequently asked questions and guide customers through your store, freeing up your time to focus on complex inquiries and building stronger relationships.
Kedra Chat: The All-in-One Solution for Exceptional Customer Support
By leveraging Kedra Chat, you can provide a personalized and efficient customer support experience that fosters brand loyalty and drives sales.  Download Kedra Chat today and take your Shopify store's customer interactions to the next level.
fields.Tags: ai chatbot, chat widget, live chat, customer support, shopify app

fields.Business Description: Introducing Thessa360 Eco-Guides, a transformative force in Thessaloniki's tourism sector. Our innovative web solution, distinctively tailored for each attraction site, transcends the limitations of conventional non-digital notice boards. Unlike their static counterparts, our platform delivers a comprehensive and dynamic guide, setting a new standard in informational depth and interactivity.
fields.Long Business Description:
Thessa360 Eco-Guides integrates meticulously curated content, including videos, historical insights, and a repository of related materials such as books, movies, and academic journals. The platform further addresses practical considerations, seamlessly incorporating accommodation options, tour guides, and transportation services, alongside essential local contact information for safety and convenience.
At the forefront of our methodology is a commitment to sustainability, manifest in public messages promoting environmental responsibility. The utilization of sustainable 3D QR plaques, crafted from recycled materials, this eco-friendly initiative is made possible through a collaborative effort with the Digital Manufacturing and Materials Characterization (DMMC) Lab at the International Hellenic University. By leveraging expertise and resources from the DMMC Lab, the project not only embraces innovative manufacturing techniques but also underscores a dedication to environmentally responsible practices in the field of 3D printing. Thessa360 Eco-Guides is not merely a technological advancement; it represents a strategic leap forward in redefining Thessaloniki's tourism landscape. Through our informative and forward-looking approach, we are poised to elevate the city's appeal, offering a sophisticated and responsible exploration experience.
The company is also dedicated to addressing accessibility challenges within the tourism sector by integrating an audio option for visually impaired individuals which will be available on the websites. This proactive measure aims to make the city more inclusive, fostering a disability-friendly environment and enhancing the overall accessibility of tourist attractions.
	Successful Pilot Websites: Thessa360 Eco-Guides has already rolled out functional pilot websites, proving the practicality of our interactive platform for tourist sites that currently lack sufficient on-site information.
	Enhancing City Appeal: Thessaloniki, a bustling tourist destination, lacks a comprehensive on-site information system, limiting visitors' experiences. Our solution aims to fill this gap by providing in-depth insights, encouraging longer stays, and optimizing resource utilization.
	Lucrative Revenue Opportunities: Our platform offers a valuable advertising space to businesses in the tourism sector, such as hotels, taxi services, and tour guides. This creates a win-win scenario, enhancing their visibility at key tourist locations while generating revenue for Thessa360 Eco-Guides.
	Unique Market Entry: Thessa360 Eco-Guides enters an underserved market, where existing notice boards are outdated, prone to vandalism, and technologically lacking. This presents a significant opportunity for innovation and improvement.
	Innovative Breakthrough: Our innovation is rooted in addressing a clear market need. By revolutionizing Thessaloniki's tourism experience and replacing outdated notice boards, we are pioneering a shift toward a more interactive and engaging platform.
	Strategic Business Partnerships: Thessa360 Eco-Guides offers businesses a strategic platform for prominent visibility at tourist locations. This opens avenues for mutually beneficial partnerships, reinforcing the platform's value as an advertising medium.
	Enhanced Visitor Engagement: Through a dynamic and interactive user experience, our platform encourages visitors to explore more, spend more time, and invest more resources during their stay in Thessaloniki.
	Proven Concept: The success of our pilot websites serves as tangible evidence of the practicality and effectiveness of Thessa360 Eco-Guides in a real-world setting.
	Technological Advancement: Thessa360 Eco-Guides introduces a substantial technological upgrade, replacing outdated notice boards with a user-friendly, vandal-resistant solution that aligns with modern expectations.
	Strategic City Positioning: Implementation of Thessa360 Eco-Guides positions Thessaloniki as a forward-thinking tourist destination, appealing to a modern and tech-savvy audience.
	Eco-Friendly Connectivity: Thessa360 Eco-Guides links websites seamlessly through visually appealing 3D printed QR plaques. These not only enhance aesthetics but also contribute to sustainability by utilizing recycled materials.
	Inclusive Tourism: The company is dedicated to addressing accessibility challenges within the tourism sector by integrating an audio option for visually impaired individuals.
Thessa360 Eco-Guides is changing the game with an interactive tourism platform, featuring unique websites for each attraction site. Simply scan the eye-catching 3D printed QR plaques, made from recycled materials, to access videos, histories, and more, making your Thessaloniki visit unforgettable. Not just a tourist guide, it's also a hotspot for businesses like accommodations, tour guides, and transportation services to showcase their offerings. Plus, there's a special section dedicated to promoting city cleanliness and sustainability.
Beyond the tourist buzz, Thessa360 Eco-Guides offers analytics to track visitor numbers at specific attractions, contributing to impactful studies and policy changes. It's not just a local gem  this proven success has worked wonders in destinations like Dubai, Rio, and United States of America. Thessa360 Eco-Guides: Bringing tourism to life, one scan at a time.

fields.Long Business Description:
SoftwareMatching.io is an online comparison platform that enables businesses to find the best-fitting ERP and CRM software. Our mission is to make the playing field, within the business software market, more even. We do this through our independent and free comparison software.
When you fill in our tool, you will receive a list of best-fit software packages. This will only cost you about 5 minutes of your time! You'll find a suitable software package through these three easy steps:
01 Insight into your business
Answer a few questions about the company and its business processes. Our comparison software does the rest.
02 Receive direct results
You immediately get an online overview with your personal advice. You can start viewing and comparing right away.
03 Schedule an appointment
Via our platform you can directly schedule a non-binding introductory meeting with the ERP or CRM provider(s) of your choice.
But why fill out our comparison tool in the first place?
 You get a completely objective and personalized advice;
 The advice is given through a comprehensive and automated requirements analysis;
 The whole process takes place online;
 You save hours and hours of research;
 After completing the survey, you will know which software suits you with no obligations.
At SoftwareMatching.io, we don't care which software package you choose. What matters to us is that you find the best package for you. This ensures that you get a completely objective advice.
What makes our model unique?
Unlike other online consultants, where your data is often sold without you knowing to whom, SoftwareMatching.io keeps your data private. The platform offers a clear overview and the freedom to compare vendors on the platform without being swamped by sales calls. You are completely in control and decide entirely whether you want to continue with any of the suppliers.
What's innovative about the platform is that you don't need extensive knowledge of ERP or CRM systems; the platform guides you through the process with ease and does all the analysis for you based on the answers to the questions. With SoftwareMatching.io, you are assured of quality advice without the cost of expensive consultants and the risk of data sales. You are in control, with the assurance that your interests as the end customer are always paramount.

fields.Business Description:
Empowering large-scale IT projects with AI-driven analytics and collective engagement.
At ORBiTL, we are a team of seasoned IT professionals and innovators committed to transforming the project management landscape. With decades of combined experience in large-scale IT projects, we bring a wealth of knowledge and a track record of success. Our mission is to provide cutting-edge solutions that address the core challenges of project management.  Our innovative and engaging solution has been proven to significantly reduce project overruns and cut project costs.
fields.Long Business Description:
The challenges in large-scale IT project management are diverse and significant. A startling statistic reveals that only 7.1% of IT projects are delivered on time and within budget. Projects often suffer from substantial cost overruns, with an average of 45% over budget, 16.7% of projects experiencing cost overruns of 200%, and schedule overruns of 70%.  
One of the core issues is inadequate stakeholder engagement, which is deemed the most valuable process in project management. Furthermore, 80% of project managers spend half their time reshaping projects due to scope change and creep.
A McKinsey study of 5,400 IT projects found a cumulative cost overrun of $66 billion, exceeding Luxembourg's GDP. Budget overruns are cited by 55% of project managers as a reason for project failure, with 14% of IT projects failing completely, 49% exceeding budget, and 25-40% exceeding their budget or schedules by more than 50%. These statistics paint a grim picture of the current state of IT project management, highlighting a dire need for innovative solutions.
Existing project management software solutions are wide in scope, but none have the functionality to prevent the above problems. That is why these problems keep on happening again and again. ORBiTLs innovative solution has been proven to work and does solve these key issues.
ORBiTL's Solution
ORBiTL Software Solutions addresses these pervasive challenges head-on with innovative tools and methodologies supported by artificial intelligence designed to enhance project management efficiency and effectiveness. The complete modular solution was developed over time to solve common problems of large-scale Enterprise Resource Management (ERP) implementations.  All three founders have worked in this environment with over 60 years of combined experience, each having encountered these problems. ORBiTLs solution has been proven to address these exact problems.

fields.Business Description:
Cinematronic is engaged in two ground-breaking product lines to significantly increase the viewer experience for audiovisual content via biometric user-reaction insights.

Firstly, we are developing a patent-pending interactive, adaptive media system.
A lot of content does not live up to users expectations, resulting in a loss of interest over time. Our system ensures a consistently high-quality user experience throughout the users media consumption. Besides making adaptable stories, the solution will become a fully automated quality assurance system. Using biosensors, the system detects the psychophysiological reaction of users and automatically adjusts the content based on their immediate needs. 

Moreover, we are working on Biometric Quality Assurance.
Conventionally, media production companies invest a significant amount of time and money in creating high-quality productions. Yet, this is not always a warranty for success. Quality assurance is often not used within the creative production phase but rather at the end of production when most of the financial and creative resources have already been spent. Our quality assurance solution uses biosensors as part of the research design within the creative process, dramatically increasing the level of user insight provided  making it easier for producers to tailor the user experience to their target audience before finalizing the productions.

fields.Business Description:
Sheetsway is at the forefront of revolutionizing the audit industry by leveraging the latest technological advancements to develop cutting-edge business tools designed to optimize and expedite auditing processes. As a pioneering company, we are dedicated to harnessing the power of artificial intelligence (AI) and other innovative technologies to create solutions that significantly reduce the time required for comprehensive audits, without compromising on precision or reliability.

Our flagship product, Sheetsway, embodies our commitment to innovation and efficiency. This AI-powered audit software offers a wide array of functionalities aimed at automating and enhancing various aspects of the auditing workflow:

Automated Working Papers: Utilizing advanced algorithms, Sheetsway automatically classifies and maps trial balances, and performs detailed risk analyses of all transactions within the general ledger, streamlining the preparation phase of an audit.

Customized Audit Procedures: By analyzing the company's industry, trial balance, and risk assessment outcomes, Sheetsway generates tailored audit procedures, ensuring a highly effective and industry-specific audit approach.

Real-Time Collaboration: Through integrated client portals, we facilitate seamless communication between auditors and their clients, enabling the efficient exchange of queries and essential documents, thereby enhancing the collaborative aspect of audits.

Advanced Data Analysis Tools: Sheetsway integrates online spreadsheets equipped with OCR and AI functionalities, simplifying data reference and analysis, and supporting auditors in conducting thorough financial examinations.

Rapid Reporting: Our software is designed to instantly generate financial statements and relevant audit letters, thereby accelerating the transition from audit completion to the delivery of final reports.

At Sheetsway, our mission is to integrate the latest technologies to create business tools that not only complete processes faster but also elevate the standards of accuracy and efficiency in the audit sector. By offering a suite of functionalities that streamline every step of the audit process, we aim to save our clients up to 60% of the time typically required for audits. This significant time savings, coupled with the enhanced quality of audit outcomes, positions Sheetsway as a valuable ally for audit professionals and firms looking to stay ahead in a competitive industry.
fields.Long Business Description:
Sheetsway represents a groundbreaking development in the field of audit software, integrating artificial intelligence (AI) to streamline and enhance the auditing process. This software stands out by offering a comprehensive suite of tools designed to automate and optimize various aspects of the audit workflow, significantly reducing the time and effort typically required. Here's a detailed look at its features and functionalities:
Audit Portal
One of the core components of Sheetsway is its ability to produce working papers, which are crucial for auditors in documenting and supporting the audit work performed and conclusions reached. The software's AI capabilities allow for several advanced functions:
Automatic Classification and Mapping: Sheetsway can automatically classify and map the trial balance. This means it can organize the trial balance accounts into the correct categories and align them with the appropriate sections of the financial statements or audit requirements.
Risk Analysis: It performs a comprehensive risk analysis of 100% of the general ledger transactions. This is a significant advancement because it allows auditors to examine every transaction for potential risk indicators, rather than relying on sampling methods that might miss critical anomalies.
Procedure Generation: Based on the industry of the company being audited, the trial balance, and findings from the risk analysis, Sheetsway can generate audit procedures. This AI-driven customization ensures that the audit approach is tailored to the specific context and needs of each audit engagement.
Client Portal
Sheetsway facilitates direct and efficient communication between auditors and their clients through:
Client Portals: Auditors can create queries directly within the software, which are automatically reflected in the clients portal account. This account is a space where essential documents can be shared automatically, such as the extended trial balance and adjustments.
Real-Time Updates: Both portals are interconnected, ensuring that any update in one portal is automatically notified in the other. This feature ensures timely and transparent communication between auditors and clients.
Integration with Online Spreadsheets
The software integrates online spreadsheets, enhancing the accessibility and usability of working papers:
Ease of Reference: Because these spreadsheets are connected to the rest of the audit software, referencing working papers is straightforward and efficient.
Advanced Testing Features: The integration of OCR (Optical Character Recognition) and AI functions aids auditors in their testing procedures, allowing for more accurate and comprehensive data analysis.
Financial Statements and Audit Letters
Finally, Sheetsway can instantly generate financial statements and relevant audit letters. This capability not only speeds up the audit process but also ensures consistency and accuracy in the final audit outputs.
Time Savings
By automating many of the time-consuming tasks traditionally associated with auditing, such as data classification, risk analysis, and procedure generation, Sheetsway can save up to 60% of the time usually required for an audit. This efficiency gain not only benefits the auditors, in terms of reduced workload and faster completion times but also their clients, who can expect quicker audit results and less disruption to their operations.
In summary, Sheetsway is a comprehensive AI audit software that revolutionizes the audit process by automating key tasks, facilitating real-time communication between auditors and clients, and integrating advanced tools for data analysis and report generation, all of which contribute to significantly increased efficiency and accuracy in auditing activities.

fields.Business Description:
We are a 3-year old, mostly bootstrapped supercalifragilisticexpialidocious Dutch startup, founded by Turkish and Azerbaijani nationals; operating in agritech, offering AI tools to Food Producers, specifically those who do contract farming.

Via our AI co-pilot FieldOps, we help Food Producers to monitor their ROI on agricultural operations consistently, by providing them with actionable insights on their fields using satellite imagery and AI.
fields.Long Business Description:
Food Producers globally rely on planned and calculated flow of the ingredients to produce the food we love to consume on a daily basis. 
They have to monitor their investment constantly and they have to make sure the farmers have enough resources and knowledge to cultivate the promised yield. 
As a result, they do their best to have a 360 view of their operations. Yet, the area is too big.
In order to monitor thousands of hectares of cultivated land, agriculture operations teams spend about fourteen thousand hours per season traveling about 20 thousand kilometers per month for 4-6 months. 
To put it into perspective, thats the distance between Berlin and Prague traveled 3 times. Per day!
Apart from this, resources are limited and have to be used according to a strict planning; For example, the water waste accumulated from incorrect irrigation is in itself a financial burden, as well as it can damage the yield and may result in degradation of soil.
In addition to that, the climate doesnt help either. Climate change has adverse effects on agriculture globally on so many levels. For example, changing weather conditions make the whole operation volatile with sudden drought or frost or floods. Or rising CO2 may result in bigger yields in some regions but it decreases the nutritional value of the crops overall.
In light of these, it is pretty clear that to cover the entirety of the operations doing only manual work is costly and massively time consuming.
We overcome all of these challenges and provide even more to our customers by simply focusing on Satellite Imageries, or a.k.a Earth Observation Technology and combining it with AI. 
Combining the strength of this data medium with the surrounding product, FieldOps, with all of its underlying tools, we bring the 360 view of the entirety of the operation into the fingertips of organizations.
Based on our calculations, FieldOps can divide the time they spend traveling into half, save them 10-20% of their expenditure on agricultural operations and make sure they plan ahead of unforeseen challenges.
Using satellite imagery and AI, FieldOps monitors croplands on a daily basis and provides insights both during the season and at the end of it. 
Currently, we are proficient on eight crops, providing AI-powered insights on them across multiple regions in two countries.
We are currently looking at doing 3 research projects this year on understanding two crops in three different regions with our potential customers.
In 2024, our key aim is to extend our services to analyzing crops in Eastern Europe, Asia and Africa, covering 12 different crops. 
We are two founders with a small team of 4 people who work in the intersection of remote sensing, software engineering, AI, product and business development. 
Berk Ulker, oversees the AI and machine learning operations at the company. He has 9 years corporate work experience in AI-based technologies and he is currently finishing his Ph.D studies in AI in Eindhoven University in the same field as Agcurate.
Metin Emenullahi, coming from Computer Science background and mostly working in the technical side, has been a startup entrepreneur for approximately 12 years now. He oversees product management, finance and strategy at the company. 
We also constantly collaborate with the academy and researchers. These researchers help us on various matters from agronomy to AI, from getting field and crop information to providing us with a consultation on various topics of science. 
We are currently raising a pre-seed round to fund our efforts until PMF. Well use the funds to finance mainly our sales & marketing teams and operations, while also covering the cost of revenue by fueling product development. 
In our efforts to reach PMF, we expect to onboard 50 customers with approximately 10000 ha of land under management.
fields.Tags: Agritech, AI, food producers, field operations

 Without strategy, execution is aimless. Without execution, strategy is useless. fields.Business Description: ForSURE is a software solution that aids businesses in collecting and analysing data for Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) reporting. Beyond simple data gathering, our tool ensures effortless compliance and provides valuable insights with just a few clicks.
fields.Long Business Description:
ForSURE is a pioneering software solution engineered to streamline the Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) reporting process for businesses, particularly modern retailers, e-commerce platforms, and SMEs. By integrating cutting-edge technology with a user-friendly design, ForSURE transforms the traditionally complex task of EPR compliance into a simplified, efficient procedure, enabling users to generate accurate, compliant reports swiftly.
The essence of ForSURE's innovation lies in its capacity to drastically reduce the time and effort required for EPR reporting. Through its beta testing phase, ForSURE demonstrated a significant efficiency improvement, condensing the EPR reporting process from an industry standard of 39 days to a mere 6 days for 300 reports across the EU. This leap in productivity exemplifies ForSURE's transformative impact on compliance management for SMEs.
Central to ForSURE's design is its adaptability and ease of integration. The software offers customizable data structures and European compliance templates, ensuring it remains relevant and effective across varying regulatory landscapes. Additionally, its real-time updates feature keeps businesses abreast of regulatory changes, eliminating compliance surprises.
ForSURE not only aids in compliance but also serves as a strategic tool for businesses aiming to showcase their commitment to sustainability. In today's market, where consumers favor eco-conscious brands, ForSURE enables retailers to affirm their dedication to environmental responsibility, thus enhancing their competitive edge.
Beyond its technical capabilities, ForSURE emphasizes a collaborative partnership with its users. The support team provides comprehensive assistance, from navigating EPR fundamentals to optimizing the software's use, reflecting ForSURE's commitment to fostering a supportive environment for industry innovation.
In sum, ForSURE is more than just EPR software; it's a strategic asset for businesses seeking to navigate the complexities of EPR compliance efficiently. By offering a blend of technological sophistication, user-centric design, and dedicated support, ForSURE empowers businesses to not only meet but exceed compliance standards, setting new benchmarks in responsible retailing. With ForSURE, businesses can look forward to redefining their approach to compliance, ensuring they remain focused on growth and sustainability in an ever-evolving retail landscape.
fields.Tags: EPR Software, Sustainability, Compliance, Data Management

fields.Business Description: Coolin is a cutting-edge sustainable cooling system handling temperature-controlled logistics for transporting and storing temperature-sensitive goods. Leveraging IoT technology, Coolin ensures precise temperature regulation, reducing environmental impact and costs while enhancing product integrity throughout the supply chain. With its unique features and adaptability, Coolin is poised to transform the way industries such as food, pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, and chemicals manage their cold chain standard parcel logistics.
fields.Long Business Description:
Coolin is a state-of-the-art sustainable cooling system designed to address the challenges of temperature-controlled logistics in transporting and storing temperature-sensitive goods for standard parcel logistics. Traditional methods of cooling, such as refrigerated transport and storage, are not only expensive but also environmentally harmful. Coolin offers a disruptive solution by leveraging IoT technology to optimize temperature regulation processes, reducing energy consumption, and minimizing carbon footprint.
At the core of Coolin's technology is its ability to maintain a defined temperature window during transportation and storage, ensuring the integrity and freshness of perishable goods. Whether it's food products like meat, fish, fruits, or pharmaceuticals such as vaccines, tablets, or serums, Coolin provides a reliable and eco-friendly solution to meet the stringent requirements of various industries.
One of Coolin's key features is its sustainability aspect. By enabling temperature-controlled transport through standard parcel logistics, Coolin eliminates the need for specialized refrigerated vehicles, reducing costs and carbon emissions. Additionally, Coolin utilizes refillable and environmentally safe chemicals, further minimizing its environmental impact.
Intelligence is another hallmark of Coolin's technology. With on-demand temperature regulation, Coolin's system initiates and regulates cooling processes only when necessary, optimizing energy usage and ensuring efficient operation. Moreover, Coolin's electronic monitoring system collects real-time data on temperature, humidity, and acceleration, providing comprehensive quality assurance for transported goods.
Coolin is not only sustainable and intelligent but also highly customizable to meet the specific needs of different industries and applications. Its adaptability allows for seamless integration into existing logistics infrastructure, making it a versatile solution for companies looking to optimize their cold chain logistics.
In summary, Coolin represents a paradigm shift in temperature-controlled logistics, offering a sustainable, intelligent, and customizable solution to meet the evolving needs of modern supply chains. fields.Business Description:
BigBro.AI gives football coaches the full picture
BigBro.AI is an innovative company using artificial intelligence and mathematics to provide football coaches and analysts all the data every football expert craves, and using artificial intelligence BigBro.AI gives clubs and academies comprehensive analytics on players fitness, technical and tactical performance, and without having to use invasive wearable sensors. By just installing cameras, coaches and analysts can gain all the data a specialist requires to improve performance. 
Our mission is to leverage AI and deep technology to revolutionise football analytics, providing coaches and match analysts with a comprehensive set of data and statistics, and enhance their players and teams performance. All through an easy-to-use, intuitive, and cost-effective solution said Tikhon Fiseyskiy, CEO and founder of BigBro.AI. "Since the data is collected from video, we have made it possible to view highlights for the desired actions and immediately apply the results, the distance between the players, the speed at that moment, all these things are calculated and explained".
BigBro.AIs neural network requires only video footage to provide comprehensive data and metrics on players and teams. With no need for wearable sensors, the solution is highly cost-effective and minimally intrusive. Coaches simply install cameras to capture training and matches, and then upload the footage to BigBro.AIs cloud platform to receive a full analysis with key performance indicators. The value of this information to football clubs and academies is immeasurable, and the companys founders predict that BigBro AIs technology will have a huge impact on the development of young players at all levels of the game.
This innovative start-up already works with football clubs and academies from Europe, Latin America and the Middle East, BigBro.AI aims to give coaches around the world the tools to make data-driven decisions and gain a competitive edge. By leveraging AI and machine learning, BigBro.AI is transforming how football teams evaluate and improve performance.

About BigBro.AI 
BigBro.AI is an AI company created by two passionate football-loving mathematicians, who believe combing maths and sports, can work wonders, just like Moneyball! BigBro.AIs neural network uses computer vision and video tracking to analyse footage of training sessions and matches, delivering insights on fitness, technical skills, tactics, and team dynamics, everything aprofessional club or academy could want, but at an ease of use, and cost that is suitable and affordable to everyone.

Microplastic Free Future is your gateway to understanding and combatting the pervasive threat of microplastic pollution. Immerse yourself in a wealth of educational resources, including scientific studies, informative news articles, and engaging community contributions, designed to empower informed action. Become an active participant in our mission to raise awareness and drive positive change by sharing your knowledge and experiences. And don't forget to explore our selection of environmentally friendly products, such as stainless steel water bottles and silicone Tupperware, to embrace sustainable living practices and protect our planet for future generations.
fields.Long Business Description:
Microplastic Free Future is an essential platform dedicated to raising awareness about the widespread issue of microplastics, which are tiny particles present everywherefrom remote mountains to the air we breathe and the water we drink. This platform is critical for educating the public on the sources and severe impacts of microplastics, and the urgent need to adopt non-plastic alternatives to mitigate their environmental footprint.
Microplastics come from various sources, including car tires, synthetic textiles like polyester, and larger plastic items that break down over time. Research from leading universities has revealed the disturbing prevalence of these particles in the environment, including findings of up to 240,000 micro-nano plastic particles per liter in bottled water, with a significant number being even smaller nanoplastics.
The health implications of microplastic pollution are significant. Studies indicate that microplastics can cause serious health issues, such as the death of kidney cells, inflammation, and cognitive effects in humans and animals alike. The detection of microplastics in human stools, lungs, and placentas highlights the critical need for safer alternatives and more effective detection methods.
Microplastic Free Future also sheds light on the misleading safety claims of BPA-free products, which often substitute one harmful chemical for another, contributing to the microplastic crisis. This issue spans a range of consumer products, from pesticides to personal care items.
The website advocates for the transition to high-quality silicone products as a sustainable solution to plastic. Silicone, unlike plastic, does not shed microplastics, degrade, or depend on harmful petrochemical additives, offering an environmentally friendly alternative. Microplastic Free Future promotes companies that manufacture silicone products with a low environmental impact, encouraging consumers to make choices that lead to a healthier planet.
Additionally, the potential of probiotics to reduce the toxicity of microplastics is explored, presenting an innovative approach to lessening the health impacts of these pollutants.
Microplastic Free Future serves as a comprehensive guide to understanding the magnitude of microplastic pollution and its effects on health and the environment. It emphasizes the critical importance of moving away from plastic products to sustainable alternatives. By providing valuable information and actionable solutions, the platform inspires individuals to join the fight against microplastics, making it a vital tool in the pursuit of a cleaner and healthier world
fields.Tags: Health Impacts, Sustainable Products, About Microplastics

Sicknote.com represents a significant shift in managing health documentation, simplifying the process while maintaining privacy and security.

fields.Business Description: We connect buyers and sellers of eco-products made by small, local shops.

Clean Matter Aps is a pioneering Danish company specializing in wastewater treatment. Our flagship technology, Power-to-P, effectively recovers Phosphorus from Sewage Sludge Incineration Ash. This technology, patented by the Technical University of Denmark, has been further refined by Clean Matter Aps in collaboration with Biofos, Denmarks premier wastewater utility responsible for the Copenhagen metropolitan area, and Kompetenzzentrum Wasser Berlin (KWB), a renowned non-profit German water research center.


Power-to-P Technology - A Glimpse:
Our proprietary electrodialysis process, Power-to-P, leverages electrical power and water to extract Phosphorus from Sewage Sludge Incineration Ash. Central to this process is the transference of ions between selective membranes, driven by an electric potential. This allows for efficient Phosphorus recovery. Notably, the process is environmentally sustainable, using only power and water and emitting no harmful gases. The outcome is a pristine, industrial-grade Phosphoric Acid, devoid of contaminants, primed for direct use as a compound in fertilizer production. Concurrently, the remaining mineral fraction, free from harmful substances, is suitable for cement aggregate use.
fields.Long Business Description:
Power-to-P Technology - A Glimpse:
Our proprietary electrodialysis process, Power-to-P, leverages electrical power and water to extract Phosphorus from Sewage Sludge Incineration Ash. Central to this process is the transference of ions between selective membranes, driven by an electric potential. This allows for efficient Phosphorus recovery. Notably, our process is environmentally sustainable, using only power and water and emitting no harmful gases. fields.Long Business Description:
Wireless transfer of the electricity-on-air
We develop ground-breaking technology that enables wireless transfer of the electricity on-air. By coupling the Magnetic Resonance Technology - Extended(MRT-E) with the Radio Frequency technology (RF or RFT) we enable electronic-and electrical equipment to power and/or charge, independently from cablesor inductive charging, over distance.
Charging ecosystem for multiple devices in motion. One biaNergy transmitter can continuously deliver power in all directions even as multiple devices move within that radius or pass behind objects.
Distance
Sending energy-on-air to devices of distances between 30 - 100meter. The receiver should not be obliged to be placed in front of a wireless power transmitter to receive power.
Data management
Two-way communication potential of RF-MRT-E, results incommends to the transmitter what data content should be sent tothe receiver and what data needs to come back.
No cloud solutions or external data management needed to transfer the data.
Freedom
Remove the need for power cables and battery replacement. The receiver should be able to move around in spatial freedom while the power is delivered, without slowing down the transfer or drawingenergy away.
Indoor and Outdoor
Our system of network is waterproof, available for more rugged devices, and are safe for metal objects.
Power Loss
Charge devices with different power needs and at speed equivalent to wired, with no power loss equal to cable-quality
Patents
Patents on our technology combination of existing RF technology and MRT-E (Magnetic Resonance Technology - Extended)
Wireless transfer of the electricity-on-air while serving to 7 ESG Goals opening new avenues for technological developments (e.g., charging a cardiac pacemaker wirelessly).
fields.Tags: energy transfer, deep tech, clean tech

fields.Business Description:
At Derelikt, we specialize in the eco-friendly recycling of plastic waste, transforming it into construction blocks for building homes and customizable components for children's playgrounds, along with a diverse range of plastic products. 

Our mission is to establish a closed-loop manufacturing process that not only eliminates waste but also provides sustainable building solutions. We're committed to promoting a greener construction industry and circular economy through our innovative recycling technology and environmentally conscious products.
fields.Long Business Description:
Derelikt is an innovative startup born from the vision to tackle Cyprus's costly plastic waste management and high electricity prices. Observing the abundance of plastic litter and the ample land available for development, with predominantly two-story buildings, I saw an opportunity for sustainable growth.
Our core operation at Derelikt focuses on collecting and recycling plastic wastewe're even prepared to incentivize the process by paying individuals for their plastic contributions. Additionally, we are partnering with the government to process state-collected waste, offering a more cost-effective solution than current practices.
Our recycled plastic is then transformed into a variety of new products using mold presses, which we sell to generate revenue. A key innovative process we've implemented is extrusion, allowing us to create construction blocks that are ten times stronger and more durable than traditional materials, and houses built from recycled plastic are twice as affordable, due to the speed of construction. These blocks are weatherproof, resistant to decay, and do not support insect infestation, making them an revolutionary eco-friendly alternative in the building sector.
Further pushing the boundaries, we incorporate our recycled plastic into industrial 3D printers (our Ukrainian partners) that are capable of constructing homes, creating an even more efficient building process.
Beyond plastic, we're also venturing into textile recycling, repurposing old clothing to create new, sustainable garments. Derelikt is not just a business, but a revolution in sustainable living, creating a closed-loop systems, building a future where waste is a resource, and eco-friendly housing is accessible to all.
fields.Tags: Recycling innovation, waste management, sustainable construction, eco-friendly materials

fields.Business Description: We understand the importance of technology in education and the need for efficient and effective content creation. That's why we've developed a website that utilizes AI to assist education professionals in generating high-quality content. We would love for you to take a look at our website and see how it can benefit you and your institution.

"StuLife" is an application designed to facilitate student life, enabling greater communication between students and making it more interesting and motivating. There are 6 main categories "Home, Books, Notes, Assistance, Events, Jobs". It functions a bit like a marketplace where students can find and sell their products that fall into one of these categories. In addition, it opens their horizons by inviting them to partecipate in events, academic activities and entertainment. It enables a better knowledge of the labor market by offering jobs, internships and HR advices from different companies. It is an application that includes almost the entire student life, making it more beautiful and thriving. The application is available and ready to download on both "AppStore" and "GooglePlay" platforms.
fields.Long Business Description:
In the ever-evolving landscape of higher education, where the demands on students are varied and dynamic, having a companion app that not only simplifies academic responsibilities but also fosters community and opens up opportunities, I think, is not just an overdue development. , but necessary.
StuLife is the brainchild of a visionary entrepreneur, which is resonating as an app that transcends the traditional boundaries of student life and the academic journey. I think that, just as it has happened in the academic environments of many developed countries, in the Albanian student life there is a gap in the market for a tool that easily integrates different aspects of student life, connects student communities and opens the doors to a world of opportunities , both academically and professionally.
At its core, StuLife serves as a digital nexus, connecting students in a virtual community that extends beyond lecture halls and study groups, through its six main categories - Home, Books, Notes, Assistance, Events and Jobs. StuLife becomes a versatile platform where students not only manage their academic responsibilities, but also engage in a vibrant community that shares resources, support and experiences.
StuLife's innovative design transforms it into a dynamic marketplace that meets the diverse needs of students. The Housing category becomes your guide to accommodation, providing an easy platform for searching and finding suitable student housing. This is made possible by cooperation with real estate agencies and private individuals in the real estate market. We also have a goal, reducing the cost of student housing, as we know very well that this is a delicate matter for every student. I must emphasize that this category offers more than just accommodation searches, as it cultivates a sense of belonging. Books and Notes democratize access to academic resources, promoting collaborative learning and knowledge sharing. On the other hand, it gives students the opportunity to promote their entrepreneurial skills by giving them the opportunity to market these books or notes. The Assistance category goes beyond typical mentoring by creating a digital space for students to seek guidance and support from peers and colleagues. It gives the opportunity to any person who has passion and desire to share their knowledge on a topic and help a student on a certain subject. StuLife recognizes that academic success is not just an individual journey; it is a collective effort.
StuLife is not limited to the academic field. The Events category adds a vibrant layer to the student experience, ensuring students stay informed about academic activities and fun opportunities happening near them. Anyone can publish an event that they organize themselves or think is important for other university colleagues. This makes the academic journey more interesting and fun since each student has the opportunity to study during the week, participate in an academic event that takes place near him and at the weekend have fun going to a party. In the "Work" category, StuLife acts as a bridge between academia and the professional world. This happens by equipping students with knowledge, employment opportunities and internships, providing a holistic approach to student development. It gives them the opportunity to create a network, expand their knowledge on the labor market, on the companies that they will want to be employed in the future by showing them the specifics and requirements that these companies have.
StuLife's vision is to empower students to confidently navigate their academic journey through the app. The app is not just a technological innovation; it is a transformative force, simplifying complexity and enriching the student experience.

The existing knowledge cannot be used and employees are wasting a lot of time searching or doing duplicate work.
Zive is an Enterprise Knowledge Platform with a novel, AI-powered approach to knowledge management. fields.Business Description: SoulcareAI is an innovative mental health platform leveraging advanced artificial intelligence to provide personalized, empathetic support and resources for mental wellness. Designed with a user-centric approach, SoulcareAI offers a range of features including mood tracking, AI-driven interactive conversations, and tailored self-help content. Our mission is to make mental health care accessible, effective, and personal for everyone, using technology to bridge the gap in traditional mental health services. With a focus on privacy and user safety, SoulcareAI is committed to transforming the landscape of mental health support, one interaction at a time.
fields.Long Business Description:
SoulcareAI represents a groundbreaking venture in the field of mental health, harnessing the power of advanced artificial intelligence to offer a uniquely personalized and empathetic approach to mental wellness. As a comprehensive mental health platform, SoulcareAI is designed to address the complexities and varied needs of mental health care in the modern world, making it accessible, user-friendly, and highly effective.
At the heart of SoulcareAIs innovative approach is its AI-driven technology, which is capable of understanding and adapting to individual user profiles. This technology not only facilitates meaningful conversations with users but also provides insights and recommendations tailored to their specific mental health journeys. Whether it's managing stress, combating anxiety, improving mood, or simply seeking a daily mental health check-in, SoulcareAIs AI component acts as a virtual guide, offering support and suggestions based on cognitive behavioral therapy principles and other psychological methodologies.
One of the key features of SoulcareAI is its mood tracking capability, allowing users to log and monitor their emotional states over time. This feature provides valuable data that helps both the user and the AI understand patterns and triggers in their mental health, leading to more effective management strategies. Additionally, the platform offers a range of personalized content, from articles and meditation guides to self-help tools, all curated to support the users mental health goals and preferences.
Understanding the importance of privacy and security, especially when dealing with sensitive mental health data, SoulcareAI adheres to the highest standards of data protection. User information is handled with the utmost confidentiality, ensuring a safe and trustworthy environment for users to explore and manage their mental health.
The market for mental health apps has seen significant growth, and SoulcareAI enters this space with a unique proposition. Unlike many of its competitors, SoulcareAI offers more than just a static set of tools and resources; it provides a dynamic, interactive experience that evolves with the user. This personalized approach, combined with the platforms ease of use and technological sophistication, positions SoulcareAI as a leader in the mental health tech industry.
SoulcareAI operates on a freemium model, making its basic features available for free, while offering a premium version with additional functionalities for a monthly subscription fee. This model ensures that the platform is accessible to a broad user base while providing a sustainable revenue stream for continued growth and development.
The team behind SoulcareAI comprises experts in artificial intelligence, psychology, software development, and business strategy, all united by a common goal to revolutionize mental health care. Their collective expertise drives the continuous innovation and improvement of the platform, ensuring that SoulcareAI remains at the cutting edge of mental health technology.
Looking to the future, SoulcareAI aims to expand its reach, explore new markets, and continuously enhance its features and AI capabilities. The ultimate goal is to establish SoulcareAI as a global standard in AI-powered mental health solutions, providing accessible, effective, and empathetic mental health care to users around the world. In doing so, SoulcareAI is not just an app or a platform; it is a movement towards a more understanding, accessible, and effective paradigm in mental health care.

fields.Business Description:
Find Out Your Personality Type By Playing A Little Game. 

Personality assessments are tools that help you to understand yourself and others better. They measure various aspects of your personality, such as your traits, preferences, motivations, and behaviors.

Playmytype is a gamified version of the Big Five model and solves two major weaknesses in the Big Five model: Flawed measurement and Biased understanding. 

You can learn more about that in our website >> https://playmytype.com
fields.Long Business Description:
Do you want to hire the best talent and build high-performing teams for your company? If so, you need a reliable and valid tool to assess the personality type and preferences of your job candidates and team members.
Playmytype is a powerful tool that provides you with unparalleled insights into your employees personalities, allowing you to optimize your recruitment and management strategies for maximum impact.
Many companies told us that our personality type assessment is a game-changer. After all, it is literally a game. They mentioned four things that made it so helpful:
1. Accurate results
PlayMyType is founded on the extensively researched Big Five model of Personality Traits, renowned for its robust reliability and validity established through decades of scientific research. 
You can trust that our game will measure your candidates and employees personality traits and preferences accurately and consistently, giving you a reliable basis for your decisions.
You can read more about the science here.
2. Interview enhancers
Our game offers an interactive, accessible adventure across all devices, where a players choice shapes the unfolding story, providing insights into their personality.
The game provides you with experiences that you can use as a reference to talk about during an interview and explore further how the candidate fits to your organization.
You can also use the game to assess your current employees personality and potential as part of a team-building event or simply to help them grow and develop.
3. Promote the company
By using our game as part of your recruitment and management process, you show your company as innovative, exciting, and fun. 
Youll more easily attract great talent without further effort and cultivate a thriving work environment which promotes diversity and inclusivity. Thats an easy way to boost your companys reputation and brand. 
4. Saves time
Successful companies told us that with us they save plenty of time. 
They had to invest less time on reading the results, as they are concise, actionable, and easy to understand. They also had to invest less time on connecting the results to the larger picture, to the companys vision and values, and to the desired outcome. 
Go ahead and check how our gamified version of the Big Five model can help your organization >> https://playmytype.com

fields.Business Description: ocane enables low-cost sustainable fuels from ocean resources: excess global warming energy, ocean acidifying CO2, hydrogen
fields.Long Business Description:
Everybody is talking about green electrons: Solar, Wind, Wave and also Nuclear and the holy grail for electrons: Fusion. Currently electrons cover about 25% of the energy mix, 75% are molecules and there is no transition path in sight other than converting use systems to electrons, such as EVs. Current forecast is that by 2050 we might get closer to a 50/50 mix. 
It is the 1st Elephant in the room. 
Everybody is talking about NetZero as if that is our destination. It is not! It is an important milestone, but what defines NetZero? It is the point we stop increasing the GHGs in our atmosphere. We will have reached maximum concentration, maximum insulation layer, maximum global heating, something to look out for in 2050. Over the last 50 years we have added 500ZJ of excess energy to the globe, adding about 13ZJ every year, 20 times our global primary energy demand. 
The 2nd Elephant in the room.  
>90% of that heat is in one medium: water, our Oceans. This heat drives the temperature increase and the threat of hitting irreversible (in our and the next many generations) tipping points that will further accelerate global heating. We need to cool things down, find ways to store that energy away. We are energy rich!
Take a Step back and look at the Elephants, we have all the Energy in the world to remove Carbon from the Oceans and the Air and to produce hydrogen and fuels, once we turn aqueous heat energy into a more useful form of energy, the WaterWattS mission.
WWS is developing IP for the aqueous heat to hydrogen conversion with bicarbonate to CO2 conversion as a side effect. This is done at large scale taking advantage of the fast global warm currents (such as the Gulf Stream) as delivery mechanisms, the global use case in mind from the start, scalability at its core.
WWS is targeting early adopters in the Oil & Gas value chain for H2 and CO2 offtake agreements for synthetic fuel production to cover hard to abate sectors but also for carbon sequestration in locations fossil fuels came from, an area we will work with upstream teams from the Oil&Gas sector.
More than 80% of current synthetic fuel costs are feedstock related:
A) location linked green electrons driving high CAPEX Electrolysis needing water purification tech to create green hydrogen
B) green CO2 from DAC (direct air capture), a tech that is early stage and also in need of location linked green energy for the recovery process.
The Oceans are a one-stop-shop for both molecules and also the currently biggest heat energy storage system, we know.
WWS is reversing what we have done to the planet.
Cool it down, remove CO2 and put the C where it came from, while keeping the economies ticking.
The fair distribution of global warm currents in the Northern and Southern Hemisphere will ensure a fair distribution of new energy industries.
This can only be done with the willing members of the Oil&Gas industry, there will be a big price for the early adopters who will drive down the cost of synthetic molecules below fossil fuel costs, following the solar PV cost curve for electrons.
fields.Tags: Ocean Cooling, Sythetic Fuel Production, Decarbonisation, Hydrogen
