fields.Business Description:
Welcome to AskRia, where we transform startup dreams into financial realities, in just minutes! 

We understand the challenges founders face in navigating the complex world of finance. That's why we've created a revolutionary platform that empowers you to build robust financial models in a mere 2 minutes. No more hours spent crunching numbers; now you can focus on what truly matters  growing your business.

But we're more than just a tool; we're your strategic partner. With our fractional CFO service, you can access top-tier financial expertise at a fraction of the cost of hiring a full-time CFO. We're committed to your success, helping you make informed decisions and navigate the financial landscape with confidence.

We know that funding is the lifeblood of startups, and there's a $3 trillion funding gap waiting to be filled. That's why we've cultivated a dynamic ecosystem of 50+ funders, ready to support you with a range of financing options, from equity to non-dilutive options such as revenue-based financing and term loans. Whether you need $10k or $10 million, we've got you covered.

Join AskRia and let's conquer the world of finance together. Say goodbye to financial roadblocks and hello to unlimited possibilities!
fields.Long Business Description:
At AskRia we're rewriting the playbook for startup success. With a mission to empower founders, we've created a game-changing platform that puts financial modelling at your fingertips, taking just 2 minutes to transform your vision into a clear financial roadmap.
But we're not stopping there. Our fractional CFO services provide you with top-notch financial expertise at a fraction of the cost of hiring a full-time CFO. We're your strategic partner, guiding you through every financial challenge.
In a world where funding is the lifeline of startups, we're the bridge that spans the $3 trillion funding gap. We offer more than equity financing; we open doors to non-dilutive options such as revenue-based financing, term loans, and more. Our partner ecosystem, comprising over 50 funders, ensures you have instant access to funds ranging from $10,000 to $10 million.
But we're not just about securing funding; we're your digital companion for business at every stage of your journey. We seamlessly integrate with your company data, drawing from accounting, banking, and CRM systems. Our goal? To create a unified, transparent repository of information that serves as your single source of truth.
Our proprietary AI and ML technology actively suggest benchmarks against standardised metrics. We're here to help you focus on what matters most, sparing you the time and effort of building financial models. But it doesn't end there. Leverage our AI/ML algorithms to run simulations, forecast trends, and conduct scenario analysis for informed, data-driven decisions.
Join us at AskRia, where innovation thrives, finance is simplified, and startups flourish. Bid adieu to the hurdles that once held you back and embark on a journey of boundless possibilities. Together, we'll redefine the future of business success!

fields.Business Description: We tailor Gen Z data at the intersection of fashion, video games and AI.
fields.Long Business Description:
We solve the need for new content in digital stores in virtual worlds and video games. At the same time we also solve the need for fashion & retail brands to have a digital presence in those worlds and can feed them valuable data about users and digital items.
For the virtual world and video games we provide a steady source of new items for in-game purchases. The developers dont need to spend time and money to develop new cosmetic items for their in-game characters. We automatically provide relevant fashion items like sneakers, garments from real-life fashion brands corresponding to their latest collections. Additionally, we can create themed items like a collection representing a movie or other famous characters. This creates an in-game revenue stream for all developers without having to spend time on the matter. We create revenues for the entire 3D community.
For the fashion/retail brand we give them access to a new channel for marketing and brand recognition together with a new revenue stream and most relevant: data. Brands simply choose what items they want to digitize and in what environment they want to be present (e.g., Roblox, Decentraland, Fortnite, Call of Duty, etc.) and our AI machine converts them into digital items for all selected environments simultaneously. We deliver valuable insights to user behavior for the brand and with digital codes we can connect the digital sales to real-life sales in their brick and mortar stores. Additionally, thee is an important sustainability component: brands can test and iterate on fashion items in the digital space before putting them into production. We did our proof of concept together with Alexander McQueen.
For the user we create cosmetic items that look fantastic and are relevant. We have the latest fashion collections from the most famous brands and the latest film and TV shows. With buying an in-game item we can generate a QR code for the user to use for the corresponding item in the real world / brick and mortar stores. With this the brands can create additional customer journeys.

Satellites provide a huge array of near-continuous remote recording of the planets sensory experience, from the gases in the air to the health of individual trees in a forest. They also provide archives of this data. And, perhaps more importantly, the ability to enable continuous ground-based measurements through internet of things (IoT) devices previously not possible due to the constraints of terrestrial communications.
Lakehouseworld brings together the power of fusion data, derived from o.a. satellites & IoT powered by a high tech datavault platform, using AI and blockchain technology. Overall, our end-to-end sustainable real estate investment solution minimizes risk while driving returns through expertise, market foresight, and dedicated property management. KRAFTMATCH ist zweifelsohne eine herausragende und hochspezialisierte Recruiting-Lsung, die gezielt auf die Bedrfnisse und Anforderungen des Handwerks- und Logistiksektors ausgerichtet ist. fields.Long Business Description:
KeepForEver is a digital legacy management platform designed to help individuals effectively manage their digital assets and end-of-life preferences. With a strong commitment to user privacy and data security, KeepForEver provides a safe and secure environment for preserving and sharing important information with designated beneficiaries.
The platform offers a range of features, including robust encryption measures, secure data storage, and the ability to specify inheritance preferences. Users can ensure that their digital assets, such as photos, documents, and online accounts, are handled according to their wishes after they're gone.
What sets KeepForEver apart is its dedication to safeguarding user data and providing a user-friendly interface for managing digital legacies. The platform's encryption technology, including AES-CBC 256-bit encryption, ensures the confidentiality and integrity of stored data.
Whether it's preserving cherished memories or ensuring the seamless transfer of vital information, KeepForEver empowers users to take control of their digital legacy. With a focus on privacy and security, it has become a notable solution in the digital inheritance landscape."

fields.Business Description: Bennupay is a cutting-edge payment orchestration platform headquartered in Cyprus. fields.Long Business Description:
Bennupay is a forward-thinking fintech company headquartered in Cyprus, poised at the intersection of cutting-edge technology and the ever-evolving landscape of digital payments. With a commitment to redefining the way businesses and consumers transact in the digital age, Bennupay has established itself as a trusted partner for enterprises seeking to optimize their payment processes, enhance user experiences, and unlock new avenues of growth.
Our Mission:
At Bennupay, our mission is clear: to empower businesses, large and small, with the tools and solutions they need to thrive in the digital era. We believe that by providing a comprehensive suite of payment orchestration services, we can transform the way transactions are conducted, making them more secure, efficient, and user-friendly.
Key Offerings:
Payment Orchestration: Our platform offers a robust and agile payment orchestration solution designed to streamline and simplify the often complex world of digital payments. Whether it's online retailers, subscription-based businesses, content creators, or gaming platforms, Bennupay ensures that payments are seamlessly managed and optimized to enhance conversion rates and customer satisfaction.
State-of-the-Art Security: In a world where data breaches and cyber threats are constant concerns, Bennupay is committed to safeguarding the integrity of all transactions. Our platform is PCI DSS Level 1 compliant, the highest level of security certification in the industry. This ensures that all financial data is handled with the utmost care and diligence.
Global Reach: Cyprus, our strategic base within the European Union, provides a gateway to serve businesses across Europe and around the world. Bennupay's platform is equipped to handle international transactions, making it an ideal partner for businesses looking to expand their reach and tap into new markets.
Cutting-Edge Technology: We are relentless in our pursuit of innovation. Bennupay leverages the latest advancements in technology, including artificial intelligence for fraud detection, real-time analytics for data-driven insights, and seamless integrations with leading payment gateways. Our commitment to staying ahead of the curve ensures that our clients always have access to the most advanced payment solutions.
Target Sectors:
Bennupay specializes in serving a diverse array of industries, including but not limited to:
E-commerce: We understand the unique payment challenges faced by online retailers and have tailored our solutions to optimize the checkout experience, reduce cart abandonment, and increase revenue.
Digital Content: Content creators and publishers benefit from our platform's ability to handle microtransactions, subscription models, and content monetization, ensuring fair compensation for their work.
Online Gaming: The gaming industry demands fast, secure, and user-friendly payment solutions. Bennupay facilitates in-game purchases, virtual currency transactions, and more for an immersive gaming experience.
Trading Platforms: In the fast-paced world of trading, reliable and lightning-fast payment processing is a must. Bennupay enables trading platforms to execute transactions with precision and efficiency.

Starting or expanding a business in Northern Europebe it in the Netherlands, Scandinavia, or beyondcan be both rewarding and challenging. You can spend countless hours studying market reports, tax regulations, and business etiquettes. You can learn the rules, systems, and common practices, but there is often more to it. As much as it is about what you know, it is about who you know. NordicHQ takes care of just that: connecting you to a network of knowledgeable, responsive, and entrepreneurial professionals in Northern Europe.
Our model is designed to offer a wide array of services, from legal advice to market entry strategies, through our robust partner network. This network is composed of local experts who not only provide you with relevant insights but also link you to potential clients, partners, and investors in the region.
In the fast-paced world of entrepreneurship, time is often of the essence. NordicHQ ensures swift communication with our clients through advanced technology platforms and dedicated customer service, so you can make well-informed decisions promptly.
Whether you are a fledgling startup or an established enterprise looking to venture into the Northern European market, NordicHQ is your reliable partner for scalable growth and success.

Beyond just service delivery, our ethos at SEO Impact is rooted in partnership. We don't view ourselves as mere vendors but as allies in your digital journey. This collaborative spirit is evident in our consultative approach, where we invest time understanding your unique business challenges, aspirations, and goals. fields.Business Description: Delve combines open banking data with our database of certified ethical brands (using sources like BCorp, 1 percent for the planet, and the fashion transparency index) to measure the impact of our users' purchases, and suggest personalised and relevant alternatives they could switch to. fields.Long Business Description:
Delve uses company and category level emissions data, industry rankings, and trusted certifications to give a sustainability rating to thousands of brands. By identifying which brands are taking the most positive action and comparing with your recent purchases using our secure open banking technology we can help you make impactful and achievable changes to your lifestyle.
When you activate an impact reward and make a purchase with one of our ethical brands, Delve receives a fee which is invested on your behalf into community scale energy projects in the UK. We only invest in projects with a clear and credible impact model, transparent governance, and an intention to become commercially self sustaining. With every change you make through Delve, our goal is create a domino effect of positive consequences that increases in impact at every step.
We created our ethical brand directory based on trusted certifications such as B-Corp, 1% for the planet and Climate Neutral Certified so that you can be sure you're shopping with brands that actually care (and have the evidence to prove it!). You can search by brand or by product to find exactly what you're looking for without compromising on your values.
fields.Tags: Climate Tech, Impact Investing, Open Banking, Fashion

fields.Business Description: InvestConservation is a mission-driven company that protects irreplaceable biodiversity in tropical forests making conservation investable by using tradable NFT tokens. InvestConservation directs significantly more money per dollar invested to conservation efforts on the ground (up to 85% vs industry average of below 60%). Efficiencies are achieved by using smart technology including blockchain tokens and satellite monitoring. InvestConservation partners with experienced conservation groups and focuses exclusively on high impact tropical forest conservation projects in biodiversity hotspots.
fields.Long Business Description:
InvestConservation focus on protection of biodiversity hotspots in tropical forests where we partner with experienced conservation groups. Each hectare of tropical forests is linked to an IC-Token that gives the holder biodiversity and carbon rights for 50 years. Token does not represent land ownership for the holder. 
The underlying program is permanent conservation but the rights are set up for 50 years. InvestConservation use a 2% annual issuance of tokens on each project. This approach motivates land owners to effectively protect their land while reducing risks to investors.
InvestConservation uses NFT tokens - where each token is linked to a unique hectare of tropical forest- issued on blockchain for transparency, traceability and avoidance of double selling of rights. On- and off-chain transfer payment solutions can be provided as the market acceptance for blockchain evolves.
We partner with top tier conservation groups for on the ground scientific based conservation work. Conservation efforts use existing methods developed by third partners. InvestConservation provides annual reports to investors and use multiple independent data sources to provide objective and transparent assessment including satellite, to monitor standing carbon, forest health and deforestation using LiDAR, radar and optical against NASA and European Space Agency data, and visual and audio data (camera traps and soundscapes) to objectively record biodiversity in addition to the on the ground observations. 
We have live projects in Ecuador and soon to come in Borneo, Indonesia.

fields.Business Description: Imagine navigating the choppy waters of entrepreneurship, only to find yourself $30,000 deep in debt due to a miscalculated decision on an ambitious application development project. Piotr, the Good Sheet app founder, was once in these very shoes. His agency was on the brink of collapse and a rapidly evolving project causing chaos. Instead of succumbing to the pressure, he decided to grab his financial reality by the horns, meticulously tracking every aspect of his budgets, invoices, cash in hand, monthly costs, and one-time costs.
fields.Long Business Description:
In this state of crisis, an idea began to take shape in Piotr's mind. He envisioned a tool that could help individuals like him gain a clear understanding of their financial health. Turning crisis into opportunity, he transitioned from a struggling entrepreneur into a self-taught programmer. He devoted nearly two thousand hours to bring his vision to life  an application designed to make financial management simple and intuitive.
The Good Sheet app, a result of Piotr's grit and dedication, is not just an app but a companion in your journey towards financial clarity. Designed to simplify complex financial data and provide actionable insights, it empowers you to plan and adjust your financial strategy with precision and confidence.

fields.Business Description: Shegby is a Web3 KYC SaaS and the Network State.
fields.Long Business Description:
Shegby offers a decentralized KYC solution leveraging blockchain and zero-knowledge proof (ZKP) technology as the foundational step towards creating a Network State. Our innovative 'Human Rank' algorithm enhances privacy and security, facilitating efficient KYC processes. This will eventually support a P2P marketplace of services within our Network State, ensuring a secure and scalable ecosystem for Web3 applications.
As pioneers in the field of cryptography, we have identified shortcomings in existing KYC solutions that are impeding the mass adoption of Web3 technologies. Concurrently, we have observed the emergence of vulnerabilities and airdrop farming by sybils and bots. We selected this idea because the existing processes are inefficient, costly and susceptible to data breaches. Our solution is based on the application of zero-knowledge proofs and blockchain technology to create a decentralised KYC solution following the theory of six separations, which is at the core of our HumanRank algorithm.

fields.Business Description: Platform for Decision Intelligence for Consumer Markets
fields.Long Business Description:
Scios.ai is a decision intelligence platform that simulates how consumers/users/subscribers make decisions to buy a product, use a service, subscribe to a platform. Through its model, companies can optimize and create strategies by running what-if experiments and getting prescriptions in minutes, rather than understanding the impact of their strategies in months/years.
A subset of questions that can be answered with Scios.ai:
	What if we change the price/messaging/features of our product?
	What if we want to launch a new product/service?
	What if a new competitor comes to the market? How to adapt to that?
	How to optimize our marketing budget?
	How to reach an x% increase in sales/revenue?
	What is the best-unified strategy that balances short-term sales goals with long-term brand health?
	How do our promotions affect long-term brand health metrics?
Bottom line -- Scios could answer all strategy questions that depend on the perceptions, considerations, drivers, purchase behavior of consumers in any market.
fields.Tags: ai, decision intelligence, strategy, predictive analytics

Generate highly personalized responses for your business's online reviews on Google, Airbnb, TripAdvisor, and many more in 50+ languages. Analyze your online reviews for common pain points and get actionable insights on how to improve customer satisfaction.
fields.Long Business Description:
"ReplyGenius.AI was developed to address two key challenges faced by businesses in today's digital landscape.
After working for an e-commerce brand (where part of my job was to craft responses and analyse customer reviews on various review platforms) it has become evident that crafting personalized responses to online reviews is often a struggle. With limited time and resources, it becomes challenging to provide highly individualized and meaningful replies that resonate with customers.
The second challenge arises from the vast amount of customer reviews available online. It can be overwhelming for businesses to manually analyse and extract valuable insights from these reviews. Identifying common complaints and praises across different platforms becomes a time-consuming task that hinders the ability to take prompt action.
ReplyGenius.AI combines the power of artificial intelligence and natural language processing to revolutionize the way businesses handle online reviews.
With ReplyGenius.AI, you can:
 Create highly individualized responses to online reviews across various platforms
 Automatically analyse customer reviews to identify common complaints and praises
 Gain actionable insights from customer feedback to enhance your business operations
How Does It Work?
 Start your free trial on ReplyGenius.AI  Select a Review Platform and paste your review  Get your ready-to-post Response tailored to the review's content in seconds.
But that's not all! ReplyGenius.AI also offers powerful review analysis features:

fields.Business Description:
The United Kingdom is estimated to miss out on up to 52 billion in terms of Gross Value Add to GDP, which could be contributed by data commercialization and related economic activities (Ref: Gov.uk, Quantifying-the-uk-data-skills-gap-full-report). However, currently, there is a lack of existing frameworks or purpose-built commercial solutions that can effectively assist enterprises of all scales in discovering, exploiting, and creating data monetization solutions to address this gap. In most enterprises, data and its management are considered cost centers, and there are no formal models in place to help businesses assign a monetary value to their data assets and realize their intrinsic value as profit centers.

The UK National Data Strategy (Ref: Gov.uk National Data Strategy) emphasizes the importance of data utilization and commercialization as opportunities to be embraced. However, there is currently no market mechanism for data publishing and information services monetization that can actualize this vision.
fields.Long Business Description:
Data Equity offers the first comprehensive suite of Information Asset Valuation Framework (IAVF) and Information Monetisation platform that empowers enterprises to unlock the untapped potential of their data. DataEquity product suite comprises of the following product lines: 
DE API Toolbox:  A cutting-edge solution that seamlessly facilitates Data Discovery and Valuation through an intuitive Graphical User Interface, enabling effortless Application Programming Interface (API) development and deployment to a secure Software as a Service platform.
DE Marketplace: Once created, APIs are readily available to the public for sale through API Marketplace. This customer-centric dynamic marketplace is tailored to each user, offering customisable options for rate-plans and pricing algorithms through intuitive self-service interfaces. 
DE InfoBot:  This ChatGPT enabled AI platform will continuously scan the marketplace platform to match opportunities to one another and help actualise data commercialisation solutions We will develop a novel AI learning InfoBot that will help our customers learn the marketplace in entirety:
- What information services can we buy or sell?
- Who to collaborate with to create new services?

fields.Business Description:
Are you tired of spending hours looking for the perfect bedtime story for your child? Introducing Oscar, the mobile app that provides not only entertainment but also valuable educational content for your child. Oscar was collaboratively created with parents to ensure that the stories are child-friendly and devoid of any problematic content.

With Oscar, you can experience the joy of reading a new story every night without the hassle of searching for one. Plus, your child can even include their parents and friends in the story, making it a personalized experience.

Oscar is designed to make bedtime a special and memorable experience for your child, and it's easy to use, perfect for busy parents. So why wait? Download Oscar now and let the enchanting world of fairy tales come to life for your child.
fields.Long Business Description:
Introducing Oscar - The Ultimate Bedtime Stories App 
Transform your child's bedtime routine into an enchanting adventure with Oscar, the AI-powered stories app designed to spark their imagination and create lasting memories. With Oscar, your child becomes the hero of their own personalized story, making bedtime a magical experience for the whole family!
 Personalized Stories for Your Little Ones 
Oscar allows your child to customize their story by selecting unique traits, characters, and even include their parents and friends to make the tale truly their own. With our cutting-edge AI technology, every story is tailored to your child's preferences, ensuring a captivating and immersive experience.
 Endless Adventures, Infinite Fun 
Say goodbye to repetitive storybooks! With Oscar, you can generate a new story every bedtime, keeping your child engaged and excited for each storytime session. From heartwarming tales of friendship to thrilling fantasy adventures, there's always something new and exciting for your child to explore.
 Life Lessons Wrapped in Enchanting Tales 
Oscar believes in the power of storytelling to teach valuable life lessons. Our wide range of stories covers essential topics such as honesty, kindness, courage, empathy, and responsibility. Let your child learn and grow with Oscar as they encounter moral dilemmas and make choices that shape their character.
 Perfect for Busy Parents and Growing Families 
We understand that life gets busy, and bedtime routines can sometimes be a challenge. That's why Oscar is designed to be easy-to-use and parent-friendly, making bedtime a stress-free and enjoyable experience. Spend quality time with your child as you explore magical worlds together and create cherished memories.

Trusted by leading crop, food, and seed producers such as Corteva, Syngenta, Bayer, and others, Proofminder operates across five continents with a growing global partner network. The platform supports 30+ use cases across row crops, seed production, orchards, and vegetables. 
Weve been recognised globally as a Top 100 Global Impact Innovator, EBRD AgVenture Winner, semi-finalist of the THRIVE Global Impact Challenge, and have secured EU grants to support our growth. 
At Proofminder, we believe in a smarter, more sustainable future for farming because every plant and leaf matters. 
Were currently closing our next funding round, get in touch to learn more

fields.Business Description: Spark is an e-mobility Super App that allows users to access a range of e-mobility services through the same platform. Spark covers a wide range of e-mobility products and services, including EV chargers, electric vehicles, scooters, technical services and car rentals.
fields.Long Business Description:
Spark is a cutting-edge app that simplifies electric vehicle (EV) charging by enabling users to access stations across multiple charging networks without the hassle of juggling multiple apps and subscriptions. With Spark, all EV charging point companies are brought together on one platform, eliminating the need for users to carry multiple payment methods, cards, or subscriptions. With one app and one login, users can access all the e-mobility products they need with ease.
Spark covers a wide range of e-mobility products and services, including EV chargers, electric vehicles, scooters, technical services, and vehicle rentals.
The Spark provides the necessary software infrastructure for charging station operators, optimizes journeys, and offers access to all charging station operators through a single app. If you need to charge your vehicle while on the road, simply open the Navigation System feature in our app to find charging stations along your route. Our app optimizes your journey to save you time and ensure the most efficient charging stops.
In addition to EV charging, our Navigation System provides access to various services that you may need during your journey. You can locate nearby hotels, cafes, restaurants, ATMs, and repair shops with ease. This way, you can make the most out of your journey with convenient and personalized recommendations.
This innovative EV Charge Point management system allows users to charge their EVs from stations within any charging network without the need to pay membership fees to multiple different operators.
In addition to providing EV charging services, Spark also serves as an e-mobility SuperApp, enabling users to access a range of e-mobility services through the same platform.
Users will soon be able to rent and use the flying car project, an innovative project that combines the features of a car and a plane, through the Spark app. The flying car project can take off and land vertically like a helicopter and fly like an airplane, providing a solution for traffic congestion and reducing travel time. By including the flying car project in its range of services, Spark demonstrates its commitment to offering the most advanced and innovative e-mobility options available.
#Spark #eMobility #SuperApp #EVCharging #NavigationSystem #Scooters #TechnicalServices

Our mission is to create a new wave of sustainable urban development by promoting the sharing and reuse of underutilized spaces. We are passionate about finding innovative solutions to address the growing demand for affordable and flexible spaces, particularly in urban areas.
We believe that our approach to adaptive reuse of spaces will not only provide a practical solution to the growing demand for space, but also contribute to sustainable urban development by reducing waste, carbon footprint, and energy consumption. Our platform enables individuals, businesses, and communities to find and share spaces that can be utilized for various purposes such as co-working, events, and retail.
At Hivenhub, we are committed to delivering exceptional customer experience by leveraging cutting-edge technologies such as AI and blockchain to provide a seamless, secure, and transparent platform. Our team comprises experienced professionals from the real estate and technology industries, who are dedicated to revolutionizing the real estate industry by promoting sustainable urban development through adaptive reuse of spaces.
We have a unique value proposition that sets us apart from traditional real estate companies. Our platform provides an alternative solution to the traditional long-term lease model, offering flexible, affordable, and sustainable options for space utilization. With our innovative business model, we are poised to disrupt the real estate industry and make a significant impact on sustainable urban development.

fields.Business Description: Deepwrk is an online platform connecting adults with ADHD to focus better and achieve more together.

The platform facilitates body doubling sessions which help members start, stay on track, and complete tasks. Users join online deep work sprints to avoid distractions, boost motivation, and maintain focus.

fields.Business Description: Succesful, together.

Billio really is about providing a supreme invoice experience to people in both private and business capacity and on both sides of the till. 

Our aim is to streamline the invoice management process starting from the creation of the bill, transmitting it from seller to buyer through QR/NFT, offer organised cloud storage and for businesses the flow ends by connecting a bookkeeping or CRM system. We want to be perceived as customer focused, lean and innovative, comprehensive in our approach to truly be a 'life' changer for anyone dealing with invoices.

Throughout our research we have received confirmation that invoice handling is a main pain point for almost all freelancers and business owners. A lot of unnecessary time and therefor money is spent on handling and/or converting physical to digital and digital to physical with all the risks of causing errors, which on its own could cause you or your company financial penalties.
fields.Long Business Description:
What we offer
Our main assets are software components created; primarily around transmitting, converting, and storing document information between external and cloud locations. The other main asset is the software written for enabling the payment link functionality to be corresponding with the transmitted invoice and enabling a buyer to pay for the goods without the need of a merchant POS.
Other software component assets are enablement of API connectivity to external CRM and bookkeeping software providers and, database analytics and data enrichment services.
For future phases we are researching possibilities to expand into; bill recovery services, advertisement, lending capabilities, wallet and pay card capabilities.
Market Analysis
Providing a holistic suite of solutions within the transaction market is seen as challenging. Below some of the research and findings around entering the Netherlands as a new provider. 
We are fully aware that components of our service offering exist already in the market either as; water downed or exclusive fashion or blended in larger propositions by players of the expense management sector.
Until proven otherwise we truly believe there is a bright future ahead for our company, simply as people have grown so accustomed to how invoices are handled and payment options are offered, we have confidence that we can be that fresh wind they are looking for, and our research has shown this too.

fields.Business Description: Reduce Physical Product Development Time by 90 %
fields.Long Business Description:

This is, in turn, associated with insufficient product differentiation, limited novelty, and substantial time-to-market. We aim to address these shortcomings with generative AI in the early stages of design optimization.
We provide a cloud-based B2B SAAS, which helps:
1. Generate novel and unseen physical product designs
2. Fine-tune individual product designs for a specific niche market
3. Complete physical product design with partial or incomplete information

fields.Business Description: recasta is a leading contributor to Infinimesh, working on "recasta cloud," an IoT and AI-focused data platform that enables data processing on the edge in order to train large AI models directly at the source to enable Industry 4.0 and smart cities without the hassle of data centralization. Recasta, which features an open API model, is working on a market place to allow digital agencies to build domain-specific services around the data regulation-safe cloud platform cecasta.cloud
fields.Long Business Description:
recasta.io enables data integration and collaboration
We are living in a changing world. Soon every company, every place, and even every person will produce a rapidly growing data lake in the blink of an eye. Todays data economy uses a fragment of this data to create new machine learning algorithms and sell them back to society. Instead of empowering new IoT markets, encouraging everybodys data ownership, stimulating the IoT ecospheres sovereignty, and democratizing IoT data, the IoT platforms of today reinforce the revenue circle for the problematic monopolies of todays IT industry. For the infinitely meshed IoT of tomorrow, which offers participation on a wide scale including companies, public places, private sectors, and individuals, we need collaboration as a service delivered by an emancipating platform.   offers this open, scalable, and ultra-secure platform with its three pillars: connect, manage, and build.
connect:
connect.recasta.cloud means simple connectivity of every device or smart edge on every network through MQTT, secured with TLS. We provide the highest encryption standards and no vendor lock-in. No agents or software are needed; use the open standards available. A frictionless REST API for only sending devices will follow soon!
manage:
control.recasta.iomeans 50 MB of IoT data stored in our cloud for the last 30 days,for free, forever. Combined with our powerful time series database, an open single device API, and the most modern zero-trust token system for data sharing, Sending and analyzing data was never so easyjust send your data as JSON, and we'll take care of everything else. And if the data needs to stay longer, just upgrade to the unlimited paid plan.
build:
[in development]
collaborate.recasta.io offers full control over when, with whom, and which data is shared. Companies, communities, and individuals have the opportunity to create new business models based on sharing specific data for creating new machine learning datasets for predictive maintenance.
social data sets:
[in development]
Data auctions for crowdsourcing, crowd sharing, and generating datasets give third-party developers the chance to market their own dashboards or custom-made analysis tools. Giving companies the opportunity to combine different vertical IoT data with the highest data sovereignty standards (GDPR, CCPA) and create added value with new symbiotic data analytics. Our platform's paradigm of "connect, manage, andbuild" unlocks the infrastructure for a safe, reliable, secure, and collaborative IoT sphere.

Subscribe to a plan.

fields.Business Description: Write beautiful & effective updates, hit send. Show your investors you care and get funded more easily.
fields.Long Business Description:
Yuzu provides a platform for entrepreneurs and startups to write and send investor updates. As a Saas Founder, you understand the importance of keeping investors up-to-date on the progress of your business, and this platform is designed to make that process as easy and efficient as possible.
With Yuzu, users can create professional-looking investor updates in a matter of minutes. The platform includes a variety of templates and customizable sections, such as financials, product updates, team changes, and milestones. Users can easily input data and metrics, add graphs and charts, and format text to their liking.
Once the update is complete, users can easily send it out to their investor network through the platform. They can choose which investors receive the update, and the platform automatically tracks who has opened and read the email. This helps entrepreneurs keep track of their investor engagement and follow up with those who may need more information.
Yuzu also includes analytics and reporting features, which allow users to see how their updates are performing over time. They can track open rates, click-through rates, and engagement levels, and use this data to improve their communication strategy with investors.
Overall, Yuzu is a valuable tool for entrepreneurs and startups who want to keep their investors informed and engaged. By streamlining the update process and providing actionable data, you are helping founders build better relationships with their investors and ultimately, grow their businesses more effectively.

fields.Business Description:
Business concept in one sentence:  
We accelerate, deepen, and democratize the knowledge gain from biomedical data for our customers from pharma and biotech. 

Product and customer benefit:
We develop a platform that provides access to cutting-edge analysis of all kinds of biomedical data in an easy way.  

It is obvious that the success of newly starting pharma and biotech companies is highly dependent on the usage of modern ways to analyze big biomedical data. However, due to high competition with other business areas for machine learning and data analysis specialists, talent is highly restricted. Companies lacking talent in this area miss on the promises of modern data analysis to cut down research costs and time-to-market resulting in a competitive disadvantage.  

Our software-as-a-service platform allows the pharma and biotech companies to analyze biomedical data without access to trained personnel. In addition, the platform offers a high coverage of machine learning and technology specific analysis modules than can be combined to provide in-depth insights into efficacy, mechanism-of-action, toxicity and other parameters that are important to the success of drug candidates. Those crucial insights can be used to improve the drug development processes.  

Our platform will democratize the usage of cutting-edge data analysis for pharma and biotech companies, which will greatly benefit the discovery of novel treatments of human diseases.
fields.Long Business Description:
Our USP:
The main unique selling point of aimed analytics is the platform and the architecture itself. The platform rethinks how biomedical data is analyzed. The modular system enables that medical data can be analyzed quickly and highly flexibly in order to answer a wide range of medical questions. This is crucial to cover the wide range of data analysis demands of our target customers. Furthermore, the underlying architecture allows the platform to grow with the progress and developments in the field of biomedical data analysis and hence to become more and more powerful.  
The principle of the platform also enables that any input data can be used, as the system is easily adaptable to different data types (e.g. genomics data, imaging data or patient's medical records). Thus, aimed analytics brings a solution to the market that enables every owner of medical data to quickly gain deep biological/clinical/medical insights into their data. Our platform is designed in such a way that the customer can easily and intuitively request an analysis and eventually interact with the generated results in a highly interactive way. With the aimed analytics platform, we have created a universal solution for medical data analysis which is a critical building block for today's era of modern data-based medicine.
Our initial customers are small and medium pharma and biotech companies (2026, from 4.9 billion to 45.2 billion USD (global prognosis, Source: Statista)). Initially, we will focus on the niche of small and medium biotech and pharma companies. This creates a directly serviceable obtainable market of 450 million USD (Europe, North America and Japan).       
No competitor currently offers an equivalent solution. Competitors either rely on pure services with limited scaling potential, on pure software solutions which do not provide the high flexibility of our system or they have focused on very specific medical issues. 
One of our strategies for a market entry relies on our extensive network in international biomedical research institutes.
Achievements:
With the concept, that aimed analytics advanced into the above mentioned platform, Dr. Gnther and Dr. Baler were already able to convince experts and received the renowned EXIST-Grnderstipendium from the Federal Ministry of Economics and Climate Protection. 
Furthermore, the idea has already been awarded and honored in numerous competitions, such as a University Bonn idea competition and the WOWFAKTOR ideas competition of the DIGITALHUB Bonn. 
With regard to the status of the platform, the proof-of-concept was successfully completed. Currently, we have started the test phase of our alpha-version of the platform with pilot customers. Recruiting pilot customers has proven to be extremely easy, as there is already a high demand for our solution due to the strong need in the market. In the process, we have not yet launched any active marketing, but the demand solely generated through word-to-mouth. To take the platform to the next level of development, we are currently recruiting a developer to join our team.

fields.Long Business Description:

fields.Business Description: We are a family owned outdoor K9 gear and content company based in the heart of the Swiss Alps. We manufacture and sell high-quality gear for dogs who love to adventure in the outdoors. Our gear line includes dog backpacks, collars, leashes, bowls, and more.
fields.Long Business Description: We are a family-owned outdoor K9 gear and content company inspired by the nostalgia of my own personal travels around the globe with my pup Thunder. After 12 years, 46 States, 30 countries, and 2 transcontinental motorcycle rallies with old Thunder, I realized that my most endearing memories with my pup came from those unforgettable adventures we shared togetherthe kinds of journeys that don't always seem fun in the moment but have a tendency to shine in retrospect as we regale our friends over a campfire with stories that combine suspense and laughter, snorts and tears in equal partsthe kinds of memories built from a questionable unfolding of comedy and mishap, moonlit nights and misty mornings, missed switchbacks and rain soaked shoes, tall tales that grow in zeal and zest with each passing year and each retelling over a campfire on a mountain side somewhere beneath the stars. We are purveyors of type II fun and full-belly laughs on empty stomachs after long days and many miles. DOGPAK was inspired by the same kinds of adventures we hope to inspire in you. Our mission is to help other people develop the same kind of bond with their pups by making it easier to get outdoors together.
fields.Tags: dogs, outdoors, dog gear, k9 equipment

fields.Business Description: ReLearn is an innovative startup created with the aim of using Artificial Intelligence to help companies and municipalities reduce their environmental impact by monitoring the waste they produce. We help companies and municipalities to achieve the Zero-Waste Goal. Thanks to Artificial Intelligence, we collect precise data on the amount of waste produced to make our clients compliant with the sustainability reporting, reducing waste-related CO2 emissions and empowering the community.
fields.Long Business Description:
Listed companies, SMEs and those that have committed to being carbon neutral are obliged to report their waste impact. Today, there is no instrument to measure the waste produced, so companies use inaccurate estimation causing high CO2 emissions and inefficiency in waste operation and sustainability strategies. ReLearn is an innovative startup created with the aim of using Artificial Intelligence to help companies and municipalities reduce their environmental impact by monitoring the waste they produce and educating the users. Thanks to NANDO, a plug-and-play sensor powered by AI, ReLearn collects accurate data on the quantity and quality of waste generated each day, calculating the recycling rate (the quality level of waste differentiation), enabling more rigorous sustainability reports and raising awareness among the corporate and city community. Through gamification, in fact, ReLearn provides an engaging communication service that makes it possible for the company to spread more awareness about environmental and waste issues, to its stakeholders.
We want to bring a waste-free lifestyle into everyone's daily routine.

fields.Business Description: Evolup is a platform that allows users to create affiliate stores powered by artificial intelligence. fields.Long Business Description:
Evolup is a software solution designed to help people create affiliate stores with ease. Here are some more details about its key features:
Simple setup process: With Evolup, creating an affiliate store is a straightforward process that takes only a few clicks. There's no need to worry about buying inventory, preparing orders, or dealing with customer service.
Works with all affiliate programs: Evolup allows users to choose from a wide range of affiliate programs, giving them the freedom to select the products they're most passionate about and promote them on their site.
Commission-based earnings: When customers finalize a purchase through an Evolup-powered affiliate store, the user earns a commission on the sale. This makes Evolup a great way to generate income online.
Advanced tools: Evolup offers advanced tools and features such as artificial intelligence, Amazon synchronization, and advanced SEO capabilities to help users maximize their earnings.
In summary, Evolup is a platform that makes it easy for anyone to start an affiliate store and earn commissions by promoting products they love.

fields.Business Description:
Get a Quick Diagnosis with Dr AI - See a Doctor Without Seeing a Doctor

Personalized care refers to healthcare that is tailored to an individual's unique needs, characteristics, and circumstances. It involves using data and technology to understand a person's health status, habits, and preferences to provide customized recommendations, treatments, and support.

Dr AI is a term used to describe artificial intelligence systems that are designed to support healthcare professionals in delivering personalized care. These systems use advanced algorithms and machine learning to analyze large amounts of data to help healthcare providers make informed decisions, improve diagnosis accuracy, and deliver more effective treatment plans. The goal of Dr AI is to improve the quality and efficiency of healthcare while reducing costs and increasing access to care.
fields.Long Business Description:
Dr. AI has the potential to significantly benefit the healthcare system and improve patient outcomes in the Netherlands. As healthcare technology advances, AI's role in addressing some of the challenges confronting the Dutch healthcare system is likely to become even more important. Dr AI implementation can provide a variety of benefits to both patients and healthcare providers, including: 
Enhanced access to care: Patients can receive medical advice and support more quickly and easily by using AI-powered virtual consultations, reducing wait times and increasing access to care.
Improved efficiency and accuracy: AI technology can quickly analyze enormous volumes of data to give clinicians more precise and pertinent information about a patient's health, enabling them to make better decisions and administer better care.
Dr. AI can assist medical professionals in managing their workload more efficiently by taking on mundane duties like triage, giving up their time to concentrate on more difficult patients.
Cost savings: By eliminating the need for in-person consultations and the administrative demands on healthcare staff, the deployment of AI technology can assist to lower expenses for both healthcare professionals and patients.
fields.Tags: Next-Gen Health Care: For People, By People.

fields.Business Description: Newel Health is an innovative company that aims to improve healthcare for patients and doctors through the creation of digital medicine and digital therapeutic solutions. It has executed a series of strategic acquisitions of early-stage startups and has a team of experts with extensive experience in the life sciences industry. The company actively researches and develops new digital product concepts in additional therapeutic areas with the goal of entering new partnerships and extending its portfolio of DTx solutions.
fields.Long Business Description:
Newel Health is an innovative company that aims to improve healthcare for patients and doctors through the creation of beautifully designed and clinically validated digital medicine (DM) and digital therapeutic (DTx) solutions.
Born from an investment play by Healthware Ventures, the company has executed a series of strategic acquisitions of early-stage startups which now constitute a portion of its products pipeline.
Its team of experts, comprised of professionals in digital, data, behavioral, and scientific fields, have extensive experience in the life sciences industry.
Strategically partnering with pharmaceutical, medical device, and other health and wellness companies allows Newel Health to expand its customer reach and achieve its vision of future health. A long history of industry partnerships and a focus on patient-centricity enables successful outcomes in these shared initiatives.
Newel Health sprints out of the gate with two digital solutions: Amicomed, a Hypertension Control program that helps people lower their blood pressure via analytic insights of longitudinal blood pressure measurements and highly personalized behavioral lifestyle modification programs, and Soturi, a suite of digital services and smart algorithms that personalize and optimize the medication and treatment plans for people living with Parkinsons disease.
The company actively researches and develops new digital product concepts in additional therapeutic areas with the goal of entering new partnerships and extending its portfolio of DTx solutions.
Newel Health also owns H.Core, a proprietary rapid-development SaMD (medical device software) framework designed to accelerate the design, validation, production, and launch of DM and DTx solutions.
